entry.title: The original Zürich landscape
entry.content:
During this excurion we will go and visit an iconic peatbog in the Zürich area. These landscapes were common in Switzerland and in particular in the area of Zürich, however now less than 5% of this precious habitat is still present in Switzerland. This is a good opportunity for an chilled spring evening walk.

Topic: carnivorous plants, orchids, moss, landscape
When: Thursday, June 8th, 2023
Let us know by: Wednesday, June 7th, 2023
Meeting point: 19:00, train station of Aathal
Hike: easy walk
Organiser: Marco Barandun

entry.title: The best via ferrata in Switzerland

link.title: The best via ferrata in Switzerland

entry.content:
First thing to mention, this excursion is hard. And you do not have to be afraid of heights. But it is really worth it! After Arriving in Monte Carasso, we will take a cable car (students: 10 CHF, adults: 19 CHF both ways included), walk for roughly 15 min. and then we will already start climbing! This is an excellent opportunity to get that winter rust off and get summer sporty for that beach look I know you want.
Note: for this excursion we will have to get up early. Sad news, however the earlier we go, the less other people will be there and the more we get done before it gets hot, the better. If we finish early we can go swimming in a river nearby :)
Important: should you not have the needed equipment, there is the possibility to rent it there for 30 CHF

When: Sunday, April 23rd, 2023
Let us know by: Sunday, April 16th, 2023

entry.title: The famous lady slippery orchids
entry.content:
During this excursion we will go in the search of one of the most spectacular Swiss plants, the lady slippery orchid Cypripedium calceolus. These orchids are exceedingly rare and require specific conditions to thrive. Nonetheless, a large population of these iconic plants can be seen near Arth-Goldau after a moderate hike. An excellent opportunity for a botanical hike!
